title: Short-Intensive Course on Understanding Mathematics Concepts through Visual Multimedia Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high-school-level basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for working professionals, visualizing mathematical concepts through mobile app-based microlearning content. Designed to intuitively understand complex mathematical theories using virtual reality (VR) and 2D/3D visualization technologies

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain basic mathematical concepts such as functions, graphs, and geometric shapes using visualized multimedia materials with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve spatial geometry problems in a VR-based 3D modeling environment with over 70% accuracy.
Learners are assessed on their ability to systematically represent mathematical concepts as visual materials using infographic creation tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
